summary: A lore-friendly younger and capable Lydia remake. Because the world desperately needed another Lydia remake.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
It seemed to me that a housecarl would usually be a younger, lower-ranking person. But there are enough young glamazon Lydia mods out there already. In this remake of Lydia, she is younger looking but remains lore-friendly and requires only vanilla assets. She now prefers light armor and comes equipped with scale armor, a Skyforge steel sword (thanks to the relationship between the Jarl and Jorrvaskr), a Whiterun shield (she does, after all, represent the Jarl), and a hunting bow.

And besides...the world desperately needed another Lydia remake.

[size=4][b][color=red]IMPORTANT!! SEE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS BELOW!![/color][/b][/size]


[size=4][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*]Marked Essential.
[*]Female gender stance.
[*]Levels with the player from 3 to 100.
[*]Custom class and combat style.
[*]Perked in her particular skillsets (one-handed, archery,block,light armor, sneak, restoration).
[*]Morality: Up to "Violence against enemies" (she still represents the Jarl)
[*]Healing and Fast Healing spells
[*]Reviewed with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url].
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/size]
Vanilla Skyrim. No DLCs required.

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
If you are starting a new game:
[list]
[*]Download with NMM.
[*]Activate in NMM.
[/list]
For an existing game - [color=red]IMPORTANT[/color]:
[list]
[*]Download with NMM.
[*]If Lydia is currently a follower of yours, dismiss her as a follower.
[*]Create a savegame.
[*]Exit game and activate mod in NMM.
[*]Load the savegame.
[*]Go to Lydia (she may still be wearing the steel armor) and have her follow you.
[*]Trade with Lydia and take EVERYTHING from her inventory.
[*]Dismiss her as a follower.
[*]Open the console (tilde key) and click on Lydia. You should see her Form ID number appear.
[*]Type: [b]disable[/b] (this will cause Lydia to disappear - that's ok)
[*]Type: [b]enable[/b]
[*]Type: [b]setlevel 1000 0 3 100[/b]
[*]Exit the console (tilde key)
[*]Lydia should now reappear and her stats should be correct (you can check with UFO)
[*]Make her a follower again and give her back her Skyforge sword, Whiterun shield, necklace, bow and arrows.
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Dismiss the follower.
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Usage[/u][/b][/size]
Do not upload this mod elsewhere, but feel free to use anything in it for your own mod.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
Load after UFO or any other mod which modifies Lydia.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18794/?]Challenging AI - Aggressive Combat Styles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?]Duel - Combat Realism[/url]

[size=4][b][u]Mods used in screenshots[/u][/b][/size]
I like a generally minimalistic approach to character visual changes. These are the mods I use which affect female appearance:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-friendly Hair - HD Textures[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females By Bella[/url] (version: No makeup just improved textures)
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
[/list]


[size=4][b][u]My Mods[/u][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13198]Incremental Difficulty[/url] - Expert and Master Difficulty increase enemy damage output without decreasing the player damage output
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18552 ]Mages Focus[/url] - a magicka regen & spell cost reduction buff spell for battlemages
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13680]Quieter Dremora Summons[/url] - Dremora summons say their lines less frequently
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18960]Giants Are People Too[/url] - Giants can be just subdued rather than killed
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18885]Khajiit Campsite[/url] - A Khajiit tent player home near Whitewatch Tower
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19360]Thadimir and Thazimir - Redguard Followers[/url] - Two Redguard one-handed and shield tanks with custom combat styles
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19738 ]Niphriel - A Wood Elf Necro Ranger Follower[/url] - Bow, one-handed and the dark arts
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19888]Belrand Reloaded[/url] - A skills and cosmetic makeover of Belrand the hireling
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url] - Moves the "I need to trade some things with you" topic up in the list of dialogue choices
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49155/?]Orc Followers[/url] - Four Orc followers with various abilities ready for battle
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49293/?]Follower Keeva-Ja - Conjurer of Fire and Ice Wraiths[/url] - Argonian follower Keeva-Ja conjures fire and ice wraiths together, and also has spell tomes so you can learn to summon these creatures
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49501/?]Lore-Friendly Lydia[/url] - A young and capable Lydia remake which remains lore-friendly.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49568/?]Resilient Follower Jewelry[/url] - Jewelry for followers to recover from bleedout better and faster
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52549/?]Jordis Empowered[/url] - A strong and attractive 2H-wielding Jordis
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52560]Adelaisa Vendicci Revised[/url] - Improve the appearance & skill of the vanilla follower Adelaisa
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52936]J'zargo the Magnificent[/url] - Makes J'zargo's skills worthy of his ego
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53157]Valdimar Improved[/url] - Improve the skills and appearance of Valdimar the housecarl
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71236/?]Uthgerd the Ally[/url] - Improve the appearance and skills of the follower Uthgerd, and bypass the brawl bugs
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71432?]Rayya Revised[/url] - Improve the appearance, outfit and skills of Falkreath housecarl Rayya
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71597/?]Annekke Revised[/url] - Improves the looks and skills of Annekke Crag-Jumper. Includes special Bounder Edition!
[/list]
